evals.prompt:
--提取 Source: 'Bob is 30 years old.'
Template: 'Name: {name}, Age: {age}'

--提取 Source: 'The conference is in Paris on June 15th.'
Template: 'Event Location: {city}, Date: {date}'

--提取 Source: 'Product X costs $50 and is available in blue.'
Template: 'Item: {product}, Price: {price}, Color: {color}'
